contentList.content: Heirs to the mystical Sunwell, Blood Elves crave magic in all its forms, and even those who do not study spellcraft can siphon the weave from others.
The craving of the Sunwell remains in half-elves with this bloodline, and even those untrained in magic possess a hint of Weave addiction.
Break the <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">concentration</LSTag> of any enemies near you, and restore an expended level [1] spell slot and/or other class resources.

Includes: <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slots</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Warlock Spell Slots</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Points</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelDivinity">Channel Divinity Charges</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath Charges</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SuperiorityDie">Superiority Die</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="Rage">Rage Charges</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Points</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="WildShape">Wild Shape Charges</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BardicInspiration">Bardic Inspiration</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ArcaneRecoveryPoint">Arcane Recovery Charges</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="NaturalRecoveryPoint">Natural Recovery Charges</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="LayOnHandsCharge">Lay on Hands Charges</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="WarPriestActionPoint">War Priest Attacks</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ArcaneShot">Arcane Shots</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="StarMapPoint">Star Maps</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="CosmicOmen">Cosmic Omens</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="Bladesong">Bladesong Charges</LSTag>.
